name: Deep (itch) (ChopieTheCat)
description:
Controls:
WSAD to move
Spacebar to jump
E to interact [you get prompted]
Left click to shoot

Description:
After a drill experiment malfunctioned and caused the death of the lead diver, the team dispatched another diver in hopes of retrieving it. After the diver had reached the ravine floor their systems went awry. The team has found another nearby ravine and hope you can find the lost drill and potentially the trapped divers. Place the beacon on the drill and bring back both divers. Be careful.

Author notes:
Second game I've ever made all by myself. I definitely over-scoped but I'm glad I got across the finish line. Surprised me when they extended the time by a day but hey just more time to work on the IO page right?

Time spent:
~4 days total
All assets were made by me or royalty free except for some of the audio and SFX.

Credits:
Composition of music and some of the sound effects: LPad
Literally everything else: ChopieTheCat

check me out on youtube plz okay thanks was fun happy halloween everyone.
